doc:
Scott Beal https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scott_Beal 0 Scott R. "Scotty" Beal (April 14, 1890 – July 10, 1973) was a film Assistant director. Born in Quinnesec, Michigan, he began his career as an actor in 1915, before switching to the other side of the camera the following year. He also occasionally doubled up as a production manager and a cinematographer. As an assistant director, he worked on Tod Browning's Dracula (1931) and Robert Florey's Murders in the Rue Morgue' (1932). Scott_R._" Scotty "_Beal ( April_14_,_1890 – July_10_,_1973 ) was a_film_Assistant_director . Born in Quinnesec , Michigan , he began his_career as an_actor in 1915 , before switching to the_other_side of the_camera the_following_year . He also occasionally_doubled up as a_production_manager and a_cinematographer . As an_assistant_director , he worked on Tod_Browning 's_Dracula_(_1931_)_and_Robert_Florey 's_Murders in the_Rue_Morgue '_(_1932_) .
